name: Bombardier Aerospace Global 7500 Arriving and Departing Calgary Airport
description:
The Bombardier Global 7500 is a new ultra-long-range business jet developed by Canada's Bombardier Aerospace, has recently completed flight testing and is now awaiting certification. It's capable of transporting 19 people over 14,000km (according to Bombardier) with a top cruising speed of Mach 0.925. Prior to certification, much like the CSeries a few years prior, it's been on some route proving flights, including this stop in Calgary! It came from Ottawa and departed an hour later for Vancouver, making this the first ever visit of a Global 7500 in Calgary! It's also my first time seeing this new business jet, and what a gorgeous aircraft it is! ATC is included, hope you enjoy this brand new bird in action!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Operator: Bombardier Aerospace (BBA)
Aircraft: Bombardier Global 7500 (GL7T)
Flight Number: BBA704
Aircraft Name: FTV4 
Livery: Demonstrator
Engines: 2x GE Passport
Registration: C-GLBR
Route: Ottawa (YOW) - Calgary (YYC) - Vancouver (YVR)
Callsign: BOMBARDIER 704
Runway used: 35R/35L
Date filmed: August 26, 2018
